title.full: PDC World Championship Darts Pro Tour
title.reduced: PDC World Championship Darts Pro Tour

description.full: Be a part of the passion and excitement of tournament darts in your own living room with PDC World Championship Darts: Pro Tour. Challenge family and friends in head-to-heads, multiplayer competitions, or take on some of the worlds’ greatest darts players including current World Champion Phil ‘The Power’ Taylor. Play in tournaments with up to 8 players or play online against your mates and players from around the world. Trigger your own celebrations after your great throws, goad your mates when you’ve just hit the 180 and with new commentary from legends of darts Sid Waddell and John Gwynn, and all the major televised events from the PDC calendar, you will be right in the centre of the action. PDC World Championship Darts: Pro Tour, the only official game of the Professional Darts Championship.
description.short: Be a part of the passion and excitement of tournament darts in your own living room with PDC World Championship Darts: Pro Tour. Challenge family and friends in head-to-heads, multiplayer competitions, or take on some of the worlds’ greatest darts players including current World Champion Phil ‘The Power’ Taylor. Play in tournaments with up to 8 players or play online against your mates and players from around the world.
